mdRecord.dcterms:title: Letter, Benjamin Rush to unknown, 1793 May 6
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Rush, Benjamin, 1746-1813
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Benjamin Rush, signer of the Declaration of Independence, writes to an unknown recipient, possibly Armand John DeRosset Sr., regarding Rush's "second volume of medical inquiries" about his "principles on dropsy and pulmonary consumption". Autograph letter signed, 1 page.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Medicine -- History -- 18th century
mdRecord.dcterms:isPartOf: Wayne Rickert Collection of Founders' Autographs
